sentences.en: According to Herodotus, the Magi were the sacred caste of the Medes.
sentences.cn: 依照希罗多德所说, 祭司(魔法师)是米提亚人的宗教阶层.

sentences.en: Das is a a member of the caste formerly known as untouchables.
sentences.cn: 达斯是一名贱民.在过去,这意味着他属于种姓层级中最低的一等,是不可被触摸的人.

sentences.en: Has there been noweakening of caste strictures in her lifetime?
sentences.cn: 种姓狭隘的现象在她的生活中有削弱的迹象么?

sentences.en: He was born into the lowest caste.
sentences.cn: 他出生于最低贱的种姓.

sentences.en: It has therefore delivered above - average economic growth, from whichlow - caste Tamils have benefited.
sentences.cn: 因此其才有高于平均水平的经济增长率, 从而使低种姓泰米尔人获益.

sentences.en: Most of the upper castes worship the goddess Kali.
sentences.cn: 大部分的印度上层种姓都信奉卡莉女神。

sentences.en: Once unified by the Ethereal Caste the Tau made incredible technological progress.
sentences.cn: 自从统一在以太阶层的领导下以来,Tau取得了难以置信的技术进步.

sentences.en: So, too , are many of theuniversity posts reserved for low - caste teachers.
sentences.cn: 因而, 许多大学的职位也给低种姓的教师预留.

sentences.en: The half - caste gave him a sidelong glance.
sentences.cn: 混血儿斜眼瞧了他一下.

sentences.en: The next Yuuzhan Vong wave consisted of the warrior caste.
sentences.cn: 阿诺的地位也因此受到负面影响.

sentences.en: The priestly caste does not normally intermarry with the warrior caste.
sentences.cn: 教士阶级通常不与武土阶级通婚.

sentences.en: They must be especially relianton caste as a business network.
sentences.cn: 他们的商业网络关系肯定异乎寻常地需要依赖种姓关系.

sentences.en: Those born into the lower caste have little opportunity to progress.
sentences.cn: 出生在低阶级的人很少有机会长进.

sentences.en: Up to half of university placesreserved for low - caste students are left vacant.
sentences.cn: 多达一半的大学入学名额留给低种姓学生不过是空谈.

sentences.en: Virasaivism rejected the Vedas, the Brahman priesthood, and all caste distinction.
sentences.cn: 林伽教派拒绝吠陀和婆罗门祭司, 还有所有的种姓差别.
